definitions: the large, oval, brown seed of a tropical palm, consisting of a hard shell lined with edible white flesh and containing a clear liquid. It grows inside a woody husk, surrounded by fiber

examples.text: gardens produced vegetables, coconut, and pineapples

shortDefinitions: large oval brown seed of tropical palm, consisting of hard woody husk surrounded by fibre, lined with edible white flesh

definitions: the flesh of a coconut, especially when used as food
shortDefinitions: flesh of coconut, often used as food

definitions: the tall palm tree that yields the coconut, which grows mainly by coastal beaches and has become naturalized throughout the tropics. Many tropical economies are dependent upon its products, which include copra and coir

examples.text: warm tropical breezes, coconut trees, and magnificent beaches

shortDefinitions: tall palm tree that yields coconut
